question.title: Neo4j node indexing: how to change Lucene default similarity?

node.contents: I'm using Neo4j (1.9) and lucene core 3.5, through the support offered by the neo4j-lucene-index library. In my code, I create a new node index like that:

astNode.text: I'm using Neo4j (1.9) and lucene core 3.5, through the support offered by the neo4j-lucene-index library. In my code, I create a new node index like that:

elements.contents: HashMap<String, String> stringMap = new HashMap<String, String>(); stringMap.put("type", "fulltext"); stringMap.put(IndexManager.PROVIDER, "lucene"); stringMap.put("to_lower_case", "false"); stringMap.put("similarity", MySimilarity.class.getName()); stringMap.put("analyzer", MyAnalyzer.class.getName()); simpleIndex = (LuceneIndex<Node>) template.getGraphDatabaseService() .index().forNodes("simple-index", stringMap);

units.rawText: HashMap<String, String> stringMap = new HashMap<String, String>(); stringMapput("type", "fulltext"); stringMap.put(IndexManager.PROVIDER, "lucene"); stringMapput("to_lower_case", "false"); stringMapput("similarity", MySimilarity.class.getName()); stringMapput("analyzer", MyAnalyzer.class.getName()); simpleIndex = (LuceneIndex<Node>) template.getGraphDatabaseService() .index().forNodes("simple-index", stringMap);

node.contents: and query the node index by means of a multi-field query:

astNode.text: and query the node index by means of a multi-field query:

elements.contents: Analyzer analyzer = new MyAnalyzer(); Query query = null; try { query = MultiFieldQueryParser.parse(Version.LUCENE_35, queriesArray, fieldsArray, flagsArray, analyzer); } catch (ParseException e) { e.printStackTrace(); return; } if (query == null) return; QueryContext qc = new QueryContext(query).sortByScore(); IndexHits<Node> hits = simpleIndex.query(qc);

units.rawText: Analyzer analyzer = new MyAnalyzer(); Query query = null; try { query = MultiFieldQueryParser.parse(Version.LUCENE_35, queriesArray, fieldsArray, flagsArray, analyzer); } catch (ParseException e) { e.printStackTrace(); return; } if (query == null) return; QueryContext qc = new QueryContext(query).sortByScore(); IndexHits<Node> hits = simpleIndex.query(qc);

node.contents: How can I change the Similarity implementation, used for sorting by score, to MySimilarity class (which extends the DefaultSimilarity and overrides some of its methods)? The reported query always uses the DefaultSimilarity and I was not able to find any hook to set the similarity used by the searcher activated during my query.

astNode.text: How can I change the Similarity implementation, used for sorting by score, to MySimilarity class (which extends the DefaultSimilarity and overrides some of its methods)? The reported query always uses the DefaultSimilarity and I was not able to find any hook to set the similarity used by the searcher activated during my query.

node.contents: The fact that the supplied similarity isn't used during queries is a bug and should be fixed. Created https://github.com/neo4j/neo4j/issues/375 to track it.

astNode.text: The fact that the supplied similarity isn't used during queries is a bug and should be fixed. Created https://github.com/neo4j/neo4j/issues/375 to track it.
